title: x/net/route: routing, network interface manipulation API
body:
https://groups.google.com/d/msg/golang-dev/7u6--PQtRpk/dHILQJDj0tcJ
https://groups.google.com/d/msg/golang-dev/tKgj8PxeV24/hY80LL5mHHsJ
https://groups.google.com/d/msg/golang-nuts/EHO-xnJa6dE/SGnDbY6TtkAJ

Motivation: It would be nice to have the package that allow manipulation of basic
networking facilities such as routing. Almost all use cases would be creating
applications that implement routing or signaling protocols for supporting routed
protocol applications such as HTTP server.

API: TBD
